name: Hawkeye
summary:
根据漫威漫画超级英雄鹰眼改编的剧集，围绕着年轻复仇者凯特·M·毕晓普的冒险故事，她在初代复仇者克林特·巴顿之后接替了这个身份。 
　　前复仇者克林特·巴顿有一个看似简单的任务：回到家人身边过圣诞节。 
　　可能完成吗？也许是在凯特·毕晓普（Kate Bishop）的帮助下吧。她是一名22岁的射手，梦想成为超级英雄。 
　　眼看巴顿的往事已经搅得节日不得安宁，两人被迫合作。

eps.name: Never Meet Your Heroes
eps.desc: Archer Kate Bishop lands in the middle of a criminal conspiracy, forcing Hawkeye out of retireme

eps.name: Hide and Seek
eps.desc: Clint has to help Kate disentangle herself from the Tracksuit mafia and a real-life murder mystery.

eps.name: Echoes
eps.desc: After escaping a new threat, Clint and Kate join forces against an expanding criminal conspiracy.

eps.name: Partners, Am I Right?
eps.desc: Secrets are revealed and hard truths emerge, culminating in a battle against two opposing forces.

eps.name: Ronin
eps.desc: After a fallout between Clint and Kate, the latter is ready to abandon her dream of becoming a hero, but Kate makes a discovery that changes everything.

eps.name: So This Is Christmas?
eps.desc: Clint and Kate's partnership is tested as they face the consequences of exposing the conspiracy.

relations.title: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
